job_title: Director of Clinical Services in Altamonte Springs, FL
pros: AdventHealth Hospice Care has a culture of employee appreciation that I have not experienced in previous places of employment. When workers feel appreciated, they are much more likely to give excellent service.
cons: I have no Cons to report

pros: Great manager, Conpassionate, knowledgeable and caring.
cons: EMR is convoluted, quality department is annoying.

job_title: Hospice Admissions RN in Altamonte Springs, FL
pros: Great coworkers, wonderful families, our mission
cons: Not enough time to complete charting

job_title: Support Services in Altamonte Springs, FL
pros: Friendly atmosphere. Feels like a family. We are a part of a large healthcare system and enjoy the benefits of this! Good Benefits and a lot of Paid Time Off!
cons: Hospice care can be tough and draining. However, this company does provide a lot of employee assistance and mental health education.

review_title: Looking for a career not a job??  Look no further
job_title: Manager of Bereavement & Volunteer Services in Altamonte Springs, FL
pros: If you are career driven this is a place for you, lots of opportunities to learn and grow, competitive pay, great management team, great benefits. stability, strong employee relations and fair work opportunities.
cons: Not Applicable to AdventHealth Hospice Care

job_title: Director of Finance in Orlando, FL
pros: Excellent leadership team with commitment to it's employees and patients served.
cons: Central Florida Hospice Care is a competitive market driving results-oriented performance, which can sometime be a stressful environment.

review_title: Best Culture and Real Sense of Team in the Industry
job_title: Business Developent in Altamonte Springs, FL
pros: Best Culture, Best Innovators, Best Collaboration, Best Leadership and Competitive Salary
cons: Offer more Mentor Opportunities, More Awards for Achievements

job_title: Case Manager in Altamonte Springs, FL
pros: Stable company. Monday thru Friday schedules.
cons: Minimal work life balance. Long hours. Salaried. Rigid management. Difficult to get pdo. Oncall required.

pros:
Strong leadership team always working toward improving processes and procedures.
Culture of caring, flexibility, health, education, professionalism.
Good communication between departments, organization and system-wide.
Great benefits.
CREATION Health program.
Many long-term employees...some since the inception of the organization.
Everyone is helpful; they want to see  you succeed. We really work well together.
If a mistake is made, own up to it, correct it and take actions so that it doesn't happen again.
Best company I've ever worked for.
cons: Badgeholder is rather large and heavy. Hoping a new one comes out in the near future.

pros:
Team atmosphere where everyone works together.
Great benefits
Wonderful mission of Extending the Healing Ministry of Christ. Having the opportunity to care for individuals on hospice and their family members!
Many different types of healthcare positions including RN, LPN, CNA, Social Work, Counseling, Pastoral Care.
cons: There are none that I can think of! This is a great place to work that allows for all different kinds of clinical shifts and opportunities.

job_title: Licensed Clinical Social Worker in Altamonte Springs, FL
pros: I work very independently, but my coworkers and leaders are always available for support when I need them. Being part of AdventHealth allows us to have access to world class health care for ourselves and our family members.
cons: Working with terminally ill patients can be intense, but the rewarding moments make it wonderful.

review_title: Some may love it but some may don't..

cons: No great benefits  supervisor are in need of training for courtesies and great customer care nurse are to be more sensible to the response of concern to family members of the clients
